metadata.description: Raise the sails and the sales, 'cause an A.P. flagship is back!  Mangazine has returned!  Captained by the able Ben Dunn, Godfather of American Manga, this ship's loaded with fresh talent and fine art!  From a demoness wreaking harsh justice to a guitarist rocking his mad ax in a world out of Mad Max, from palace intrigue on a distant world to a duel of baked goods versus baked bads here on ours!  All hands on deck, and prepare to enjoy!
metadata.name: Mangazine , Vol. 4
